ygData.msgSnippet: First, I m going to start by saying that I write team, I mean 4 or more characters [or a single slime]. What s  the worst team you ve sent through the

First, I'm going to start by saying that I write team, I mean 4 or 
more characters [or a single slime].

What's  the worst team you've sent through the scenarios?

Anybody had teams that consistently had problems, no matter how far 
through the scenarios you've went through.

Currently, I'm sending a team of 1 barbarian, 1 fire elemental, 1 elf, 
and 2 clerics through the scenarios. [Of course, I'm dodging "Tic and 
Tac" for now; I'm saving that scenario for when my weakest team member 
has a higher experience level than the highest experience level 
character in the scenario.]

* * *

Voting will start on Monday using **ONLY** the scenarios nominated by 
the deadline. [Sorry, but I'm a real sticklier for rules, especially 
the ones I make.]
